title: 突发！！！世贸组织专家小组表示，美国对中国征收的关税缺乏依据！
contents:
北京时间2020年9月15日22时，美联社报道，世界贸易组织表示，根据该组织的规则，美国政府对价值超过2000亿美元的中国商品征收的关税是没有依据的。
（原文：the Panel concluded that the United States had not provided an explanation demonstrating how the imposition of additional duties on the selected imported products in List 1 and List 2 was apt to contribute to the public morals objective invoked, and, following on from that, how they were necessary to protect public morals. ）
